message.content:
<<<api>>>: String.replace(CharSequence target, CharSequence replacement)
<<<code>>>: String str = "cat dog fish dog fish cat";
str = str.replace("cat", "temp");
str = str.replace("dog", "cat");
str = str.replace("temp", "dog");
str = str.replace("fish", "temp");
str = str.replace("cat", "fish");
str = str.replace("temp", "cat");
<<<explanation>>>: One way to solve this problem is to replace each substring with a temporary placeholder, and then replace the temporary placeholders with the desired substrings. In this case, we first replace "cat" with "temp", then "dog" with "cat", and finally "temp" with "dog". We repeat this process for "fish" as well.
